column2: Notice of material changes will be posted on the Site's homepage
We reserve the right to revise this Privacy Policy at any time by posting an updated Privacy Policy without advance notice to you.

Notice of material changes will be posted on the Site's homepage and/or will be provided by e-mailing you or notifying you upon login about these changes; the form of such notice is at our discretion. However, we encourage you to check this Privacy Policy and Terms of Use Agreement often for updates.
Latin Post may provide notice of terminations or changes in services on this Site.
unless we provide advance notice of any other use.
In such cases, we will provide to you an explanation of why access cannot be provided and contact information for further inquiries.
